title: How to Make a Fondant Bow with Stripes
description: Showcase your fondant skills by learning how to make this Classic Black & White Fondant Bow. A large fondant bow acts as an eye-catching centerpiece, making this a stunning piece for a wedding, birthday, or anniversary party.

asset.author: Wilton
asset.description:
Showcase your fondant skills by learning how to make this Classic Black & White Fondant Bow. A large fondant bow acts as an eye-catching centerpiece, making this a stunning piece for a wedding, birthday, or anniversary party.

Get the printable how-to here: http://bit.ly/2aLEhLP 

Stay Sweet, Subscribe: http://s.wilton.com/10vmhuv

Ingredients: 
- Ready-To-Use Gum Paste - http://bit.ly/2aZbmAA 
-  Wilton White Candy Melts - http://bit.ly/2b3yqfQ 
- Wilton Black Decorator Preferred Fondant - http://amzn.to/2bf6eZ6 
- White Decorator Preferred Fondant - http://bit.ly/29InLLN 
- Gum Glue Adhesive - http://bit.ly/2aB0U45 

Tools: 
- Fondant Trimmer - http://bit.ly/2aVKcIX 
- Fondant Roller - http://bit.ly/2b3yRXM
